comments: Start the Device Authorization flow using form-encoded parameters

params.name: client_id
comments: The unique client identifier. The client Id is the Id of the FusionAuth Application in which you are attempting to authenticate.

params.name: client_secret
comments: (Optional) The client secret. This value may optionally be provided in the request body instead of the Authorization header.

params.name: scope
comments: (Optional) A space-delimited string of the requested scopes. Defaults to all scopes configured in the Application's OAuth configuration.
